name: EpicMafia: Lights Out
description: A simple Dark version of EpicMafia, made for those who prefer a not-so-bright screen. Needs some Beta Testers. CHROME VERSION HERE
additional_info:
Made by Mimichu and Riddler with inspiration from Jacube who has gone AWOL.

Notes: -THIS VERSION IS FOR FIREFOX AND MAY NOT WORK FULLY ON OTHER BROWSERS. CHROME VERSION HERE -In game chat color cannot be changed, we're waiting for Lucid to fix that for us. -There are still some minor glitches around the site, as such we need people to test this for us and tell us what we missed in this thread: http://www.epicmafia.com/topic/42039 -We changed the font around the site from Arial to Tahoma so that I and l can be distinguished. -This isn't a complete skin and we will be keeping it updated, so be sure to check back frequently (or at least each time we post an update in the thread)
